Row.Text: Contribute this city's [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards the Treasure Fleet project. Cost goes up based on the number of players in the game, and the current Era.

Begins the Treasure Fleet project. Once underway, Civilizations can contribute [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards its completion by selecting it in the city production list. When complete, Civilizations receive bonuses based on how much they contributed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_GOLD]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_TREASURE_FLEET_3_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_SILVER]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_TREASURE_FLEET_2_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_BRONZE]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_TREASURE_FLEET_1_HELP}
Admirals, navigators, sailors, and shipbuilders from around the world are gathering resources to create a Treasure Fleet, the largest and most prestigious fleet of ships ever made.
Receive one Frigate. 300 points towards next [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
Receive a free Great Admiral and 3 of your military units will be maintenance-free.
Grand Canal wonder appears in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. ({TXT_KEY_BUILDING_GRAND_CANAL_HELP})
Contribute this city's [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards the Global Wargames project. Cost goes up based on the number of players in the game, and the current Era.

Begins the Global Wargames project. Once underway, Civilizations can contribute [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards its completion by selecting it in the city production list. When complete, Civilizations receive bonuses based on how much they contributed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_GOLD]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_WARGAMES_3_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_SILVER]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_WARGAMES_2_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_BRONZE]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_WARGAMES_1_HELP} [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Replaceable Parts.
The militaries and military officers of the world's empires have assembled to highlight their fighting prowess and to make a claim to global preeminence.
Receive one Infantry and 3 of your military units will be maintenance-free.
Receive a +25% attack bonus to all Military Units for the next 30 turns and 4 of your military units will be maintenance-free.
Menin Gate wonder appears in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. ({TXT_KEY_BUILDING_MENIN_GATE_HELP})
Contribute this city's [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards the United Nations project. Cost goes up based on the number of players in the game, and the current Era.

Begins the United Nations project. Once underway, Civilizations can contribute [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards its completion by selecting it in the city production list. When complete, Civilizations receive bonuses based on how much they contributed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_GOLD]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_UNITED_NATIONS_3_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_SILVER]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_UNITED_NATIONS_2_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_BRONZE]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_UNITED_NATIONS_1_HELP} [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Atomic Theory.

A new era in global diplomacy and international relations has dawned. Delegates, officials and dignitaries from around the world have gathered to celebrate the construction of the United Nations, and with it the future of the human race.
Receive an immediate boost of 25 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all City-States. The Consulate National Wonder appears in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. ({TXT_KEY_CONSULATE_HELP})
United Nations wonder appears in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. ({TXT_KEY_UN_HELP})
